## Functions

### allocateRVVReg() {#a1e4c374329ac8dd85a653f4880a6b0d5}

<MemberDefinition

<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvsubtarget-h">RISCVSubtarget.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcregister-h">llvm/MC/MCRegister.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Calling Convention Implementation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The expectations for frontend ABI lowering vary from target to target.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ideally, an LLVM frontend would be able to avoid worrying about many ABI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// details, but this is a longer term goal. For now, we simply try to keep the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// role of the frontend as simple and well-defined as possible. The rules can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be summarised as:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; Never split up large scalar arguments. We handle them here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; If a hardfloat calling convention is being used, and the struct may be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// passed in a pair of registers (fp+fp, int+fp), and both registers are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// available, then pass as two separate arguments. If either the GPRs or FPRs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are exhausted, then pass according to the rule below.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; If a struct could never be passed in registers or directly in a stack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// slot (as it is larger than 2&#42;XLEN and the floating point rules don&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// apply), then pass it using a pointer with the byval attribute.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; If a struct is less than 2&#42;XLEN, then coerce to either a two-element</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// word-sized array or a 2&#42;XLEN scalar (depending on alignment).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; The frontend can determine whether a struct is returned by reference or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not based on its size and fields. If it will be returned by reference, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// frontend must modify the prototype so a pointer with the sret annotation is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// passed as the first argument. This is not necessary for large scalar</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// returns.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; Struct return values and varargs should be coerced to structs containing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register-size fields in the same situations they would be for fixed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// arguments.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45" lineLink="#aed6b03a6d97ffdf80abe4df6ae7cd343"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> <a href="#aed6b03a6d97ffdf80abe4df6ae7cd343">ArgFPR16s</a>&#91;&#93; = &#123;RISCV::F10&#95;H, RISCV::F11&#95;H, RISCV::F12&#95;H,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      RISCV::F13&#95;H, RISCV::F14&#95;H, RISCV::F15&#95;H,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      RISCV::F16&#95;H, RISCV::F17&#95;H&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48" lineLink="#a01bd8182990cfe5b244bb375eacc2e9d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/loongarchisellowering-cpp/#a01bd8182990cfe5b244bb375eacc2e9d">ArgFPR32s</a>&#91;&#93; = &#123;RISCV::F10&#95;F, RISCV::F11&#95;F, RISCV::F12&#95;F,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      RISCV::F13&#95;F, RISCV::F14&#95;F, RISCV::F15&#95;F,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      RISCV::F16&#95;F, RISCV::F17&#95;F&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51" lineLink="#a94770b45a721b9391ba730d9e5682004"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/loongarchisellowering-cpp/#a94770b45a721b9391ba730d9e5682004">ArgFPR64s</a>&#91;&#93; = &#123;RISCV::F10&#95;D, RISCV::F11&#95;D, RISCV::F12&#95;D,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      RISCV::F13&#95;D, RISCV::F14&#95;D, RISCV::F15&#95;D,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      RISCV::F16&#95;D, RISCV::F17&#95;D&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is an interim calling convention and it may be changed in the future.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55" lineLink="#a05558c5f83dfc81ec4cd2786aef7af33"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/loongarchisellowering-cpp/#a05558c5f83dfc81ec4cd2786aef7af33">ArgVRs</a>&#91;&#93; = &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RISCV::V8,  RISCV::V9,  RISCV::V10, RISCV::V11, RISCV::V12, RISCV::V13,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RISCV::V14, RISCV::V15, RISCV::V16, RISCV::V17, RISCV::V18, RISCV::V19,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RISCV::V20, RISCV::V21, RISCV::V22, RISCV::V23&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59" lineLink="#a18f02b2aa97da41c1d6f1db4df8f98ce"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> <a href="#a18f02b2aa97da41c1d6f1db4df8f98ce">ArgVRM2s</a>&#91;&#93; = &#123;RISCV::V8M2,  RISCV::V10M2, RISCV::V12M2,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     RISCV::V14M2, RISCV::V16M2, RISCV::V18M2,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     RISCV::V20M2, RISCV::V22M2&#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Both halves must be passed on the stack, with proper alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: To be compatible with GCC&#39;s behaviors, we force them to have 4-byte</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    State.addLoc(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass">TargetRegisterClass</a> &#42;RC = TLI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringbase/#a1a78b9f867cb5be3a052d6ad972484ca">getRegClassFor</a>(ValVT);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RC == &amp;RISCV::VRRegClass) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assign the first mask argument to V0.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is an interim calling convention and it may be changed in the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LocInfo = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a2b78fd53da0b5df7bc4eacf7df556a45a0f94adbbe71c94edaa533a25973bbffc">CCValAssign::BCvt</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">      State.addLoc(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a29708e79e029f1029d46d65e7631b778">CCValAssign::getReg</a>(ValNo, ValVT, Reg, LocVT, LocInfo));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is a variadic argument, the RISC-V calling convention requires</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that it is assigned an &#39;even&#39; or &#39;aligned&#39; register if it has 8-byte</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// alignment (RV32) or 16-byte alignment (RV64). An aligned register should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be used regardless of whether the original argument was split during</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// legalisation or not. The argument will not be passed by registers if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// original type is larger than 2&#42;XLEN, so the register alignment rule does</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not apply.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: To be compatible with GCC&#39;s behaviors, we don&#39;t align registers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// currently if we are using ILP32E calling convention. This behavior may be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// changed when RV32E/ILP32E is ratified.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TwoXLenInBytes = (2 &#42; XLen) / 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!IsFixed &amp;&amp; ArgFlags.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty/#a5359817edf9b75bc65808bd59655feba">getNonZeroOrigAlign</a>() == TwoXLenInBytes &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeAllocSize(OrigTy) == TwoXLenInBytes &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ABI != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvabi/#a11c6ee2d4e18ec16c570243cc285c7e9a9e062b1814798f2a29e2b28e74a36bc1">RISCVABI::ABI&#95;ILP32E</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RegIdx = State.getFirstUnallocated(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/loongarchisellowering-cpp/#aa88409177d80547eb31363501517a066">ArgGPRs</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip &#39;odd&#39; register if necessary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RegIdx != std::size(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/loongarchisellowering-cpp/#aa88409177d80547eb31363501517a066">ArgGPRs</a>) &amp;&amp; RegIdx % 2 == 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlight">      State.AllocateReg(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/loongarchisellowering-cpp/#aa88409177d80547eb31363501517a066">ArgGPRs</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;CCValAssign&gt;</a> &amp;PendingLocs = State.getPendingLocs();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;ISD::ArgFlagsTy&gt;</a> &amp;PendingArgFlags =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlight">      State.getPendingArgFlags();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PendingLocs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() == PendingArgFlags.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;PendingLocs and PendingArgFlags out of sync&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Handle passing f64 on RV32D with a soft float ABI or when floating point</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers are exhausted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (XLen == 32 &amp;&amp; LocVT == MVT::f64) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PendingLocs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Can&#39;t lower f64 if it is split&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Depending on available argument GPRS, f64 may be passed in a pair of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GPRs, split between a GPR and the stack, or passed completely on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stack. LowerCall/LowerFormalArguments/LowerReturn must recognise these</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> Reg = State.AllocateReg(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/loongarchisellowering-cpp/#aa88409177d80547eb31363501517a066">ArgGPRs</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">      int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stackoffset">StackOffset</a> = State.AllocateStack(8, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(8));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">      State.addLoc(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a36d9dd26dea75ebba5b55516b52e0752">CCValAssign::getMem</a>(ValNo, ValVT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stackoffset">StackOffset</a>, LocVT, LocInfo));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LocVT = MVT::i32;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">    State.addLoc(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a3213a94802bb4f87a3e388af6cdd9d7f">CCValAssign::getCustomReg</a>(ValNo, ValVT, Reg, LocVT, LocInfo));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">      State.addLoc(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Split arguments might be passed indirectly, so keep track of the pending</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// values. Split vectors are passed via a mix of registers and indirectly, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// treat them as we would any other argument.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#abdeb0e345d1884804b99c02dafb2eb08">isScalarInteger</a>() &amp;&amp; (ArgFlags.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty/#a989f6c0917729b4622f413f629239420">isSplit</a>() || !PendingLocs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LocVT = XLenVT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LocInfo = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a2b78fd53da0b5df7bc4eacf7df556a45aacf7e7d80f766b55b2bbdaf3d354c39e">CCValAssign::Indirect</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PendingLocs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PendingArgFlags.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(ArgFlags);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the split argument only had two elements, it should be passed directly</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ValVT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#abdeb0e345d1884804b99c02dafb2eb08">isScalarInteger</a>() &amp;&amp; ArgFlags.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty/#a0343079be1a948f58f37c97559973b90">isSplitEnd</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PendingLocs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() == 2 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpected PendingLocs.size()&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Apply the normal calling convention rules to the first half of the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty">ISD::ArgFlagsTy</a> AF = PendingArgFlags&#91;0&#93;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FastCC has less than 1% performance improvement for some particular</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// benchmark. But theoretically, it may have benefit for some cases.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8276b8e4ba01bd306af7ad5f001e2806"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8276b8e4ba01bd306af7ad5f001e2806">llvm::CC&#95;RISCV&#95;FastCC</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ValNo, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> ValVT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> LocVT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a2b78fd53da0b5df7bc4eacf7df556a45">CCValAssign::LocInfo</a> LocInfo,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty">ISD::ArgFlagsTy</a> ArgFlags, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate">CCState</a> &amp;State,</span></CodeLine>
